text: Yesli by My predpisali im bol'shiye tyagoty, povelev im nepreryvno srazhat'sya, podvergayas' opasnosti, zhertvovat' soboy za Nashu Istinu, ostavlyat' ochagi vo imya bor'by za pryamoy put' Allakha, to lish' nemnogiye iz nikh povinovalis' by. A ved' Allakh - slava Yemu Vsevyshnemu! - ne trebuyet ot lyudey togo, chto im trudno ispolnit'; no yesli by oni sdelali, kak On povelevayet, to dlya nikh eto bylo by blagom i luchshe v blizhney zhizni i v posleduyushchey zhizni, i ikh vera, polozheniye i spokoystviye stali by prochneye
